website_summaries.verdict: This cute castle puts a Mario-themed spin on the traditional gingerbread house.
pros: The set includes pre-baked castle pieces and plenty of Mario-themed candies and decorations to adorn the finished product
The gingerbread house kit comes with a colorful base and includes different color icing to really make it feel like a Mario castle
cons: Pieces of gingerbread break and crack easily

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to do this gingerbread house this year, he was so disappointed when we opened the box and all the pieces were broken. Thankfully I was able to salvage most of it and after a few additional decorations and 3hrs of work we did pretty good. I wouldnt recommend buying this type of product online again. Anyone who has trouble assembling my advice is to use a hot glue gun, worked great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea bad exicution
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to have something to do with my son. The cookies came broken as well as Mario but that's not why this won't work. Even if you can get them to glue back togeather the bottoms of the cookies are not flat they are rounded it won't ever stay up even with soda cans to try and help stabalize it it fell down and came unglued.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Really frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with several of the pieces broken in multiple pieces. With some panels coming broken into as many as 5 pieces it was especially difficult to assemble the kit. In addition to the icing not gluing the panels together quickly or securely, we also had to worry about the glued-together broken pieces falling apart with any degree of pressure put in the wrong place. It was more stressful than it needed to be. I understand gingerbread houses are more difficult than they seem when it comes to construction, but the fact that they came with broken parts made me less than excited I'd spent this much money on a themed kit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a fun idea for my family during Christmas time. It came completely broken like it had been stomped on. The Amazon box and Gingerbread box were fine, it was just everything inside that was smashed. I figured I would try again, so I sent it back and ordered a new one. Same thing. Don't waste your time, or money. They are all junk.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M Powers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! This kit is so cute and original. Came packed safely and unbroken unlike another kite I ordered. Pieces are thick and all items are included. I did have to use another piece of gingerbread in the center to stabilize the center of the RV in order to get it to stand.
customer_reviews.author: MamaHouse

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable but I admit we had a great time decorating ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 grandchildren (13, 6 & 4) and I to build / decorate. These are adorable but I admit we had a great time decorating the camper pieces and eating the frosting and parts of the gingerbread pieces and never did 'build' the campers.
customer_reviews.author: Kiers

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble gingerbread house, complete kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, pre-cut pre-baked gingerbread walls and roof. Plenty of icing (good consistency) and all the necessary decorations and tools. This year's fondant was a great added decorating touch! My son and I had fun assembling and decorating!
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

customer_reviews.title: Broken and missing pieces. Really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Really terrible. All the gingerbread pieces were broken before opening. The red fondont was missing and so were some of the decorations. The green fondont was brittle and unuseable. The icing refused to stick to the gingerbread pieces we tried to put back together (because again they were all broken). The icing also expired in 2015. Just a reminder it’s 2017 right now. Just a truly god awful product. Never have I had such a bad experience with a product purchased on amazon. If I could give negative stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Cute to create once...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly because I thought it was cute. They are a little skimpy on the frosting. Perhaps I used too much on one side, but I ended up not having enought for the other side. They should give you a little extra just in case. The taste is highly sweet and okay, not fabulous. It was cute to do once ...
customer_reviews.author: T M Millot

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in many broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: My excited 8-Year-old received her gingerbread house from her Elf today, and we just opened it to find it broken into a million pieces! I received broken gingerbread houses through the mail before, but they were reparable by gluing them together with icing. This is so bad, there is no way to repair it. Now I have a heartbroken child with no gingerbread house for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: ponzu

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy in store
customer_reviews.text: Do not order! It's an adorable concept but ours came broken and it says this item is ineligible for return
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Cute!
customer_reviews.text: So darn cute!!! We are love to camp, so this was perfect for our holiday decorating. Was easy to assemble and decorate and tasted good, too! We would definitely get this kit again.
customer_reviews.author: HappiKampers

customer_reviews.title: Only bought it because it was Mario
customer_reviews.text: I only give it two stars because the concept is cool and my gamer kids thought it was the coolest gingerbread house kit we’ve ever done. Arrived in multiple broken pieces. The instructions said to ice it back together...not so easy. It said to use cans to hold it in place to dry for many hours. We did, but a few days later it still collapsed. It looked neat the few days it stayed together. Great idea but did not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Grimm

customer_reviews.title: I know that I bought this off-season. My granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I know that I bought this off-season. My granddaughter wanted to make a Summer Gingerbread house. I ordered three separate gingerbread themed kits. When I looked at the packaging on this product it was obvious that this had been opened and resealed. To me this is not a NEW item. The original tape has rounded edges and was cut through and then taped over. This to me is not a NEW item. A NEW item is sealed the way you would by it from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these kits for my grand daughters. We liked the fact that the houses were pre-assembled as this saved a lot of time. They were easy enough for the kids to decorate and they included plenty of candies. The reason for three stars is that one of the kits came totally crumbled and could not be salvaged. Had to run out at last minute to purchase another kit. Of course, could not find one pre-assembled and had one very disappointed little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived smashed to pieces :(
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in a visibly undamaged box, but smashed to pieces inside. There was a central crack through every piece and then smithereens from there. We had a very sad little boy when we opened this up at our gingerhouse decorating party. I literally spent an hour hot lueing the shards of cookie back together in an effort to give him any decoratable surface.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Freed

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as cookie crumbs. The box was damaged to the point that someone had to tape it back together with clear tape. So disappointed. 😔 there was no possibility of gluing the cookies back together. The damage had to occur at the source because the outside wrapper was fine. It should not have been shipped in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk1989

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on this arriving in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly but three of the four castles that we ordered arrived shattered into crumbles. Too bad because the one that we were able to assemble was super cute. I am unable to return the damaged items so I'm out $75 which is a total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy James

customer_reviews.title: The fun my grandson had putting it together.
customer_reviews.text: And I saw a couple reviews that said there were corners broke out so on and so forth and yes this one did too, but nothing the frosting couldn't fix. To me, it was the fun for my grandson,& maybe a little over priced, but it was fun for him😊 And that's why I didn't give it a total 5 star because of the breaks and a bit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Smashed and Broken
customer_reviews.text: Ours arrived today and was broken into many pieces. The cookie is smashed completely. I am hoping we are able to salvage any of it. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Broken Castle Pieces
customer_reviews.text: We bought two Mario Castles and both arrived with broken pieces. My boys were excited but we could not put enough icing to hold the castle together. It was disappointing to receive two broken products. Please package these better when shipping.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I spent less than the original $30 that was ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could have bought in a store. Had a tonnnnnnb of broken pieces! I was able to salvage the majority of it to at least get the castle together - had my kids wanted to help it would have been a nightmare. Glad I spent less than the original $30 that was all over the internet. I would have been very upset. Still came out cute though and I do love the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wight

customer_reviews.title: Terrible so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't print my first comment since it wasn't favorable. I suppose you don't or won't for any negativity. The second house came as a pile of dust also. Wouldn't order this product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son how loves Mario. Opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son how loves Mario. Opened it tonight to put together and all the gingerbread was broken.....I'm sure this could have happened during shipping but the package had no protection for travel. Very disappointing. Would have returned it but he is three and still wanted to decorate it.....
customer_reviews.author: Allison Marriott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just went to make our gingerbread house and two pieces were broken in half. Total bummer?!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Locke

customer_reviews.title: It needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: When I got mine and opened it, Mario's leg was broken and the top of a castle wall had broken in half. It was a little flimsy and broke easily. I'll stick to normal houses.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: An adorable Gingerbread Camper which my grandson just loved.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this gingerbread camper - so new and exciting than the regular gingerbread houses. My grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very very happy with this item, I did read all the reviews and mostly all of them said that there's came in broken but mine did not come broken I'm so happy about that so now we could be built it. My son is super excited!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect shape! I am so glad I took a chance in this and ordered it for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: LV mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fun & Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, easy to assemble, fun to decorate and inexpensive. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken :(
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very broken, there is not enough candy to make it look like the picture. Not a good value. We made graham cracker houses.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this kit
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this kit. Upon opening it, the mushroom was broken, the green fondant was so hard we couldn't use it and even following the instructions and starting it a few hours ahead of time to let the icing settle, it still fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every cookie piece was broken
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box every gingerbread piece was cracked, including toad. We used the icing to piece back together, but it made it take a while to complete. Design was cute. My 6 year old loved it, but was a headache to make broken pieces work.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Definite fail
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say this would be one of those “nailed it” projects. Wouldn’t go together, stay together or stay upright. Plus, it tasted pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Wrong wrong
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get the gingerbread house I wanted. I ordered the camper but got the dog house. And there is no way to return it. What a waste of money. Thanks for ruining a family tradition because everyone we so excited to build the camper this year.
customer_reviews.author: jamie Caleindo

customer_reviews.title: So fun! Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This was lots of fun to make. I was nervous because some reviews said it came broken but that was a risk I was willing to take. It arrived just fine. My boyfriend and I had a great time messing around with it. We had a competition for whose side was the best. I won, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So adorable dog house gingerbread house.  Great for animal lovers.
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for different gingerbread houses and this doghouse was adorable. My granddaughter was so excited and really loved this house.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. I should have read the reviews first. And it was not eligible for return.

customer_reviews.title: Lily don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible just horrible. Two of three house I ordered came shattered. So disappointed. Had to go out and buy them myself. Never order them again. Gave them one star bc I had to.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this gingerbread house for my son to make for Christmas. Guess I should have opened the box sooner as it is broken into a bunch of pieces. The mushroom is not repairable. I have no time to purchase another gingerbread house to put together. I'm hoping I can save it. We shall see.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: A complete and utter disappointment. The walls came broken beyond the point of even being able to attempt to construct it. I basically paid $25 to open up the box and then throw it in the garbage. DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift to a friend and they loved it. Did see it cheaper at Walmart though

Lesson learned, buy from a brick & mortar not online.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delightful

customer_reviews.title: Kids and I were all disappointed.

product_meta.title: Wilton Build It Yourself Gingerbread Camper Decorating Kit
product_meta.description: Style Name:CamperTake your gingerbread house decorating tradition on the road this holiday season with this adorable camper decorating kit. The gingerbread panels are pre-baked and pre-shaped, so you don’t have to be a baking engineer to get this fun retro camper-shape. Kit comes with everything you need to assemble and decorate. You can follow the instructions online to create the design you see on the package, or you can let your imagination go and try your own!
feature_bullets: Includes: 3 pre-baked panels, mini multi-colored candies, white and green ready-to-use icing, black ready-to-use icing tube, decorating bag, cardboard base, and access to online decorating instructions
For best results, assemble camper 3 to 4 hours ahead of decorating to allow time to dry
Assembled camper measures approximately 6 in. wide x 2 in. deep x 5 in. high
Contains wheat. Made on equipment that also processes milk, egg and soy
Multi-colored candies made in China. Remainder of contents made in Canada

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars282 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
